channel.title: Pest control (portal help)
channel.description: i've added full pest control to my server (made 100% by me)...but i have a problem with the portals acting as monsters and fighting back.Also a problem with the portals are respawning and was wandering how to eliminate those problems from my pest control. -plz help me out -thanks =)
